video.title: Gatsby - Full Tutorial for Beginners
video.description:
Learn how to use the Gatsby static site generator in this full tutorial course for beginners.

⭐️ Contents ⭐️
⌨️ (00:00) Introduction
⌨️ (01:38) Mac & Windows Installation
⌨️ (04:46) Creating a new site
⌨️ (11:19) Adding Content
⌨️ (17:10) Linking Pages
⌨️ (22:04) Interactive Pages
⌨️ (29:18) Building your site
⌨️ (31:53) Components
⌨️ (37:07) Plugins
⌨️ (42:47) Layouts
⌨️ (46:54) Site Data
⌨️ (55:12) File Data
⌨️ (1:04:24) Working with Markdown

Course developed by Mike Dane. Check out his YouTube channel for more great programming courses: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvmINlrza7JHB1zkIOuXEbw

🐦Follow Mike on Twitter - https://twitter.com/mike_dane

🔗The Mike's website: https://www.mikedane.com/

⭐️Other full courses by Mike Dane on our channel ⭐️
💻C: https://youtu.be/KJgsSFOSQv0
💻C++: https://youtu.be/vLnPwxZdW4Y
💻SQL: https://youtu.be/HXV3zeQKqGY
💻Ruby: https://youtu.be/t_ispmWmdjY
💻PHP: https://youtu.be/OK_JCtrrv-c
💻C#: https://youtu.be/GhQdlIFylQ8

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: Carlton Freeman
topLevelComment.text: Thanks for putting this together! For anyone running into issues with the Layout section -- layouts are no longer a thing! This article from Gatsby was really helpful to me in migrating from Layouts to the new, more React-y way Gatsby handles this -- https://www.gatsbyjs.org/blog/2018-06-08-life-after-layouts/

topLevelComment.text: This approach with Layouts is not relevant anymore in version 2

replies.author: Paul
replies.text: npm install gatsby-plugin-layout , add that to the config just like the typography plugin and change the children() to children

replies.author: Ibán López
replies.text: No, if you are building small things. But if you try to decouple a CMS (and I don't mean just a blog), importing dynamic data from WordPress and WooCommerce, you definitely need different layout components each of them regarding to different kind of content/templates that you are gonna have in those dynamic sites. StaticQuery can't be used in such scenarios. And talking about SEO, I think StaticQuery is a big big mistake. You can't have an static and single title for a whole site on every url of a website. So, maybe I'm wrong, but what do you think about?

topLevelComment.author: Ashish Arora
topLevelComment.text: hello bro how ru . i need ur help , i want to learn only one in Angular , Vue and react . plz telme which is best in all  . i want ur personal opinion . if ur beginner then which will u select personally. plz tell me 1 .which one best in job n future .

replies.author: freeCodeCamp.org
replies.text: All three could be good to learn. There are currently more jobs in React than Angular and Vue but different regions have more jobs in different frameworks so you may want to check what jobs are available around where you live.

3. Vue

I would definitely choose Angular over other :)
